segments.source_content: This week, we have two exciting blog posts for the React team, and a special guest from the React core team has a message for you all!

translations.zh-hant: 本週，React 團隊發布了兩篇令人興奮的部落格文章，更有來自 React 核心團隊的特殊嘉賓要傳達訊息給各位！

segments.source_content: We've also been reading quite a few interesting blog posts from the "official" blogs and the community.

segments.source_content: **[Convex: The Database Designed for AI Coding](https://convex.link/thisweekai)**

segments.source_content: In the age of code generation, you need a backend that you can confidently generate with AI platforms. Convex is by far and away [best in class](https://stack.convex.dev/introducing-fullstack-bench) in this respect.

segments.source_content: This is because Convex is just TypeScript, allowing you to write [queries as code](https://docs.convex.dev/functions/query-functions/) that are automatically transactional, cached, and realtime.

translations.zh-hant: 因為 Convex 採用純 TypeScript 設計，讓您能編寫[程式化查詢](https://docs.convex.dev/functions/query-functions/)，這些查詢自動具備交易性、快取機制與即時更新能力。

segments.source_content: And that’s just the beginning. With Convex, you can:

translations.zh-hant: 這僅僅是開始，使用 Convex 您還能：

segments.source_content:
- Easily schedule functions and write cron jobs
- Set up file storage
- Write efficient server functions
- And so much more…

- 建立檔案儲存系統

segments.source_content: ## 📣 From the React team {#react-core-team}

translations.zh-hant: ## 📣 來自 React 團隊 {#react-core-team}

segments.source_content: [![React Labs: View Transitions, Activity, and more](/emails/issues/231/labs.jpg)](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)

translations.zh-hant: [![React Labs: View Transitions, Activity, and more](/emails/issues/231/labs.jpg)](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)

segments.source_content: **[React Labs: View Transitions, Activity, and more](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)**

translations.zh-hant: **[React Labs：檢視轉換、活動等新功能](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)**

segments.source_content: The rumors you’ve heard that the React Team only cares about the server have been greatly exaggerated.

translations.zh-hant: 關於 React 團隊只關注伺服端的傳言，實屬過度誇大。

segments.source_content: In our [React Labs post](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more) today, we shared that [View Transitions](https://react.dev/reference/react/ViewTransition) and [Activity](https://react.dev/reference/react/Activity) are now ready to try out in our experimental channel, along with docs for each. These new features allow React running on the client to animate UI transitions, and hide and show parts of the UI as the user navigates client-side. They work with server features, but are aimed at solving problems on the client.

translations.zh-hant: 在今天的 [React Labs 文章](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)中，我們宣布 [View Transitions](https://react.dev/reference/react/ViewTransition) 和 [Activity](https://react.dev/reference/react/Activity) 功能已可在實驗頻道試用，並附有對應文件。這些新功能讓客戶端運行的 React 能實現 UI 轉場動畫，並在使用者進行客戶端導航時動態顯示/隱藏 UI 區塊。它們雖能與伺服端功能協作，但主要解決客戶端問題。

segments.source_content: We also [shared updates](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more#features-in-development) on problem areas we’re focusing on that impact client-rendered apps including better profiling tools, automatically compiling effect dependencies, a potential IDE extension, fragment refs, and yes even a concurrent store. These are problem areas we’ve wanted to address for a while, which recent features like the React Compiler and the `use` API allow us to finally tackle.

translations.zh-hant: 我們也[更新了](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more#features-in-development)影響客戶端渲染應用的重點開發領域：包括強化效能分析工具、自動編譯 effect 依賴項、潛在的 IDE 擴充功能、片段引用(fragment refs)，甚至並行儲存機制(concurrent store)。這些長期存在的痛點，正因 React Compiler 和 `use` API 等新功能而得以解決。

segments.source_content: These features are still early and might change significantly before they’re ready to try. You can follow along while we build these features, and this newsletter is a great way to stay up to date. But don’t stress about learning everything \- you can let us cook first.

translations.zh-hant: 這些功能尚處早期階段，正式發布前可能大幅變動。您可持續關注開發進度，本通訊是掌握最新動態的理想管道。無須急於學習所有內容——請先讓我們專心開發。

segments.source_content: When we’re more confident a feature will ship, we’ll announce it on the blog and publish docs, like we’re doing today for View Transitions and Activity.

translations.zh-hant: 當我們對功能發布更具信心時，將如同今日的 View Transitions 和 Activity 一樣，在部落格正式公告並發布文件。

segments.source_content: Give the new experimental features a try, and check out the areas we’re working on in the [blog post](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more).

translations.zh-hant: 試用新的實驗性功能，並在[部落格文章](https://react.dev/blog/2025/04/23/react-labs-view-transitions-activity-and-more)中查看我們正在開發的領域。

segments.source_content: \-[Ricky Hanlon](https://bsky.app/profile/ricky.fm)

translations.zh-hant: \-[Ricky Hanlon](https://bsky.app/profile/ricky.fm)

segments.source_content: The React Labs post is not the only exciting update this week! The React Compiler is also in Release Candidate, in preparation of the compiler’s stable release.

translations.zh-hant: 本週令人振奮的更新不僅限於 React Labs 的文章！React 編譯器也已進入發佈候選階段（Release Candidate），為編譯器穩定版的發佈做準備。

segments.source_content: The Babel-free builds is a welcome improvement so that we can keep using the compiler with our modern Rust tooling!

translations.zh-hant: 免 Babel 的建構方式是一項受歡迎的改進，讓我們能在現代 Rust 工具鏈中持續使用編譯器！

segments.source_content: **[Legend List 1.0](https://bsky.app/profile/jayz.us/post/3lni5ofbuvs2s)**

translations.zh-hant: **[Legend List 1.0](https://bsky.app/profile/jayz.us/post/3lni5ofbuvs2s)**

segments.source_content:
Making long lists performant is a hard problem, and React Native’s old architecture wasn’t making it any easier with it’s asynchronous layout computation. We remember Margelo abandoning their `WishList` project.
Legend List is now in version 1.0, and promises to be even faster than `FlashList`, all the while handling the "hard cases": bidirectional infinite lists, varying item sizes… And it's compatible with the old arch (though less performant and with possible glitches).

translations.zh-hant:
實現長列表的高效能渲染是個艱難挑戰，而 React Native 舊架構因非同步佈局計算使問題更加棘手。我們記得 Margelo 曾放棄其 `WishList` 專案。
Legend List 現已發布 1.0 版，承諾比 `FlashList` 更快速，同時能處理「複雜案例」：雙向無限列表、可變項目尺寸... 且兼容舊架構（儘管效能較低且可能出現閃爍）。

segments.source_content: As Seb mentioned last week, there’s also a [v2 of `FlashList`](https://github.com/Shopify/flash-list/tree/new-rlv-prototype) in the works, which should be easier to use (no need to specify estimatedItemSize for instance).

translations.zh-hant: 正如 Seb 上週提及，[`FlashList` v2](https://github.com/Shopify/flash-list/tree/new-rlv-prototype) 也正在開發中，將更易使用（例如無需指定 estimatedItemSize）。

segments.source_content: Thankfully, all those copy the API of `FlatList` so it’s easy to switch back and forth 🙂.

translations.zh-hant: 所幸這些函式庫皆複製 `FlatList` 的 API，因此能輕鬆切換使用 🙂。

- 📖 [React Native 版本政策](https://reactnative.dev/contributing/versioning-policy)：此新頁面詳述基於 `0.x.y` 模式的版本規範。更重要的是，它同時解釋發布流程與破壞性變更的定義標準。這屬於釐清公開 API 範圍（甚至縮減範圍）的持續努力（參見[移除深度導入 RFC](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/894)）。React Native 正趨於穩定，或許未來會迎來 v1.0？
- 📜 [減少 Expo 應用延遲的最佳實踐](https://expo.dev/blog/best-practices-for-reducing-lag-in-expo-apps)：強調透過開發工具直接高亮 React 渲染、React 編譯器、React 19 及多線程處理。
- 📜 [行動端離線文字識別：我們如何將 EasyOCR 引入 React Native ExecuTorch](https://blog.swmansion.com/bringing-easyocr-to-react-native-executorch-2401c09c2d0c)
- 📜 [如何用 Expo & ElevenLabs 打造通用應用語音助手](https://expo.dev/blog/how-to-build-universal-app-voice-agents-with-expo-and-elevenlabs)
- 📜 [告別舊架構，迎接新架構（預設啟用）](https://expo.dev/blog/out-with-the-old-in-with-the-new-architecture)
- 📦 [React Native Brownfield 1.0](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-brownfield/releases/tag/v1.0.0)：新增 SwiftUI、Jetpack Compose 支援及框架封裝功能。
- 📦 [typegpu-confetti](https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/typegpu-confetti)：專為 React Native 設計的彩帶動畫，完全透過 `react-native-webgpu` 和 TypeGPU 在 GPU 上運算渲染。
- 🎥 [Expo Router 教學](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsXDmrmFV_AT17JDf-otXSNE_eH7s0uDD)：前 5 部影片已上線，涵蓋佈局檔案、堆疊 & 標籤導航、模態視窗及驗證流程。
- 🎙️ [RNR 328 - 與 Alexandre Moureaux 探討 Flashlight](https://infinite.red/react-native-radio/rnr-328-flashlight-with-alexandre-moureaux)
- 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 65 - Expo SDK 53 預覽、RevenueCat 付費牆、AI 圖像 & Gemini](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=evGUO_CN1Fc)
